lore.origin: Rangers emerged from the need for speed. While wizards craft and warriors command, rangers move. They discovered that the first arrow often matters more than the perfect arrow.
lore.philosophy: Prototype beats planning. Ship something, anything. Iterate from reality, not imagination. The best code is code that exists.
lore.weakness: Technical debt accumulates. Speed creates shortcuts. Rangers must eventually slow down or drown in scaffolds.
lore.mastery_path: From copy-paste (the amateur's arrow) to template mastery (the crafted quiver) to generative scaffolding (the infinite bow).
